post.body: Oh, alright then.
Yeah, it's good! I just wish I had the remix from the album, but I don't because I didn't buy the album on iTunes. :(
Here's good news! Free LEGAL download of a "Never Miss a Beat" remix: http://tinyurl.com/5xx7ro. Thought you might like it!
Actually, I made butternut squash kugel and broccoli kugel. I like to mix things up a bit!
Two different kinds, too. I's got skillz.
Good luck!
Good question! He was saying it like "pawned." OY.
Well you know what they say about great minds...
Me too!
Those are probably two of my favorite musicals of ALL TIME. And both are coming to Broadway. I NEED TO SEE THEM!
*sniff* If only I was still at UMD. I'm trying REALLY hard to get tickets to either that or "Guys and Dolls" for Chanukah.
WHAT?? No "Daily Show" or "Colbert Report"? What am I going to do now? NOT COOL, INDEED!
Thanks! I'm incredibly excited and happy for her!
Yeah, I heard about that a while ago. I can't wait to see him in the new Sherlock Holmes movie, too.
How true, how true. Lauren Willig sure knows how to write a good, dashing, hero.
And it doesn't help that he's described as being very, very handsome. I have a fun time casting him in my head as I read!
But being the stubborn guy he is, I'll bet he tries to. Still, I love the guy. I can't help it.
Knowing Amy, I wouldn't put it past her! But when's Miles coming?? Presumably, being married to Richard's sister, he'd be there.
Did you read today's chapter?
Ah, okay. I guess I missed that part in all the excitement. :) I want them to make up already!
I was hoping that, too. But does it take place before or after Richard and Miles's fight?
Although, I'll admit, I'd like more Miles/Henrietta because Amy is starting to get on my nerves. But I'll take what I can get!
Haha. JANUARY 22nd CAN'T COME SOON ENOUGH!!!!
I know! I know! I was the first person to comment on that post, too! I CAN'T WAIT!!!!!!
Cooking for Shabbos has left me a little kugeled out, if you catch my drift.
I wish my brother would stop saying "PWNED" every other second.
Okay, so it's not as if I exerted myself in any unusual way today -- so why is it that I HURT?
Dear U.S. labels that represent The Fratellis and Kaiser Chiefs, MAKE MORE OF THEIR MUSIC AVAILABLE IN THE STATES! Sincerely, Me.
Excuse me while I have a love affair with the Kaiser Chiefs.
When in doubt, eat some Hershey's Kisses.
I've got the horse right here, his name is Paul Revere.
WAAAAAAAAH. I WANT TO GO! http://tinyurl.com/5mncs5
Well, at least the Jets won.
Don't you just love cleaning and doing laundry ALL DAY?
Okay, back to cleaning my room.
MY BEST FRIEND/ROOMMATE FROM COLLEGE IS ENGAGED! :D
Part One of "Fitzgerald Frenzy": Watching "The Great Gatsby"
OUCH. The roof of my mouth still hurts and throbs after having burnt it last night.
OMG MUST SEE THIS WHEN IT COMES TO NYC: http://tinyurl.com/7bec2z
Wow. Tom Cruise in "Tropic Thunder."
